text: I’m happy to update the docs at <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts> if there’s a way to do it
Pls ping me if anyone knows if that’s possible

Hi everyone, does the default GET request only return a certain number of properties for a HubSpot contact record. I'm only getting:

1. createdate
2. email
3. firstname
4. lastname
5. lastmodifieddate
I have several other properties filled out for this record, (phone, emailDomain, etc), do we have to make separate API calls to retrieve them?
